verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] not punting Iran problems down the road , writes Reuel Marc Gerecht , a former CIA officer now a senior fellow at the Foundation for Defense of Democracies .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: punting] [ARG1: Iran problems] [ARGM-LOC: down the road] , writes Reuel Marc Gerecht , a former CIA officer now a senior fellow at the Foundation for Defense of Democracies .
[ARG1: Donald Trump is not punting Iran problems down the road] , [V: writes] [ARG0: Reuel Marc Gerecht , a former CIA officer now a senior fellow at the Foundation for Defense of Democracies] .
